name: Volatile Cedar
descr: [Volatile Cedar](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G0123) is a Lebanese threat group that has targeted individuals, companies, and institutions worldwide. [Volatile Cedar](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G0123) has been operating since 2012 and is motivated by political and ideological interests.(Citation: CheckPoint Volatile Cedar March 2015)(Citation: ClearSky Lebanese Cedar Jan 2021)

subtechniques.name: Vulnerability Scanning
subtechniques.descr: [Volatile Cedar](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G0123) has performed vulnerability scans of the target server.(Citation: CheckPoint Volatile Cedar March 2015)(Citation: ClearSky Lebanese Cedar Jan 2021)

subtechniques.name: Wordlist Scanning
subtechniques.descr: [Volatile Cedar](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G0123) has used DirBuster and GoBuster to brute force web directories and DNS subdomains.(Citation: ClearSky Lebanese Cedar Jan 2021)

technique_table_data.name: Exploit Public-Facing Application
technique_table_data.descr: [Volatile Cedar](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G0123) has targeted publicly facing web servers, with both automatic and manual vulnerability discovery.(Citation: CheckPoint Volatile Cedar March 2015) (Citation: ClearSky Lebanese Cedar Jan 2021)

technique_table_data.name: Ingress Tool Transfer
technique_table_data.descr: [Volatile Cedar](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G0123) can deploy additional tools.(Citation: ClearSky Lebanese Cedar Jan 2021)

subtechniques.name: Web Shell
subtechniques.descr: [Volatile Cedar](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G0123) can inject web shell code into a server.(Citation: CheckPoint Volatile Cedar March 2015)(Citation: ClearSky Lebanese Cedar Jan 2021)

software_data.name: Caterpillar WebShell
software_data.descr: (Citation: ClearSky Lebanese Cedar Jan 2021)(Citation: CheckPoint Volatile Cedar March 2015)

software_data.name: Explosive
software_data.descr: (Citation: CheckPoint Volatile Cedar March 2015)(Citation: ClearSky Lebanese Cedar Jan 2021)

ClearSky Lebanese Cedar Jan 2021.description: ClearSky Cyber Security. (2021, January). “Lebanese Cedar” APT Global Lebanese Espionage Campaign Leveraging Web Servers. Retrieved February 10, 2021.
